channel.title: Range dupe
channel.description: 1.both players dont wear anything 2.one takes range gear other takes items he wants to dupe 3.the guy with dupe items gets a skull 4.and then range guy starts killing other guy 5.when range guy sees that other guy is dying (emote) and the he clicks log out 6.the duper guy keeps clicking log out so that both of them log out at the same time 7. then they bot log in 8.they take 2x the duped items

increase the timing rate to logout inside combat

item.title: Range dupe
item.dc:creator: @elmer elmer
item.description:
@elmer wrote:

I have this problem with my server too. That 10 seconds combat thing only works if they are both attacking each other. The only way to fix it is to make it so if only 1 person is attacking you can’t log out either. I don’t know if thats possible because I don’t know how to do it. Thats the only way I can think of how to fix this dupe =.

Read full topic

item.title: Range dupe
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:5, topic:325929”]You need to add an Anti X-Log. Or in simple words, make it so they cannot log out in combat, only 10 seconds after being in combat, Like what RuneScape does. There are tutorials on it, because I added it to mine.[/quote]No. It works on DeltaScape and DeltaScape has the 10 seconds after being in combat thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Range dupe
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

You need to add an Anti X-Log. Or in simple words, make it so they cannot log out in combat, only 10 seconds after being in combat, Like what RuneScape does. There are tutorials on it, because I added it to mine.

Read full topic

this work liek this

1player hwne 2player have 0hp 1player logout
2player get c lsot
result = 2 duped items.[/quote]

Me and my friend plays. I attack him with range.

1player hwne 2player have 0hp 1player logout 2player get c lsot result = 2 duped items.

please tell on english
